sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { BsFillBagFill } from 'react-icons/bs' import styles from '../../styles/styles' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getAllOrdersOfShop } from '../../redux/actions/order' import { backend_url } from '../../server' const OrderDetails = () => { const { orders, isLoading } = useSelector((state) => state.order); const { seller } = useSelector((state) => state.seller); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [status, setStatus ] = useState(""); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAllOrdersOfShop(seller._id)); }, [dispatch]); const data = orders && orders.find((item) => item._id === id); return (

Order details

Order list
Order ID: #{data?._id?.slice(0, 8)}
Placed on: {data?.createdAt?.slice(0, 10)}
{/* order items */}

{data && data?.cart.map((item, index) => (
{item.name}
{item.discountPrice} x {item.qty}$
))}
Total Price: {data?.totalPrice}$


Shipping Address:

{data?.shippingAddress.address1 + " " + data?.shippingAddress.address2}

{data?.shippingAddress.country}

{data?.shippingAddress.city}

{data?.user?.phoneNumber}

Payment Info:

Status:{" "} {data?.paymentInfo?.status ? data?.paymentInfo?.status : "Not Paid"}



Order Status:

{data?.status !== "Processing refund" && data?.status !== "Refund Success" && ( )} { data?.status === "Processing refund" || data?.status === "Refund Success" ? ( ) : null }
Update Status
) } export default OrderDetails
